      Parameters:
      length - Password Length
      Returns:
      Generated Password

    • updateOptions

      public AES updateOptions​(AESOption options) throws IOException, GeneralSecurityException
      Updates the AES options, and verifies/generates all the required Key's based on the updated Options.
      Parameters:
      options - AESOption
      Returns:
      AES Builder
      Throws:
      IOException
      GeneralSecurityException

    • writeKeyFile

      public AES writeKeyFile​(File fileObject) throws IOException
      Creates a KeyFile which will store all the encryption information such as Key Length, Private Key, IV Length, Algorithm Type, etc. into one file which can be loaded later to re-generate everything without requiring manual input.
      Parameters:
      fileObject - File Object to Write To
      Returns:
      AES Builder
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is any kind of file error.

    • encryptBytes

      public byte[] encryptBytes​(byte[] input) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Encrypts a ByteArray with the information received in the Options.
      Parameters:
      input - ByteArray Input
      Returns:
      Encrypted ByteArray
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - If there is an encryption error.

    • decryptBytes

      public byte[] decryptBytes​(byte[] input) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Decrypts a ByteArray with the information received in the Options.
      Parameters:
      input - ByteArray Input
      Returns:
      Decrypted ByteArray
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - If there is an encryption error.

    • decryptByteString

      public String decryptByteString​(byte[] input) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Decrypts a ByteArray with the information received in the Options as a String.
      Parameters:
      input - ByteArray Input
      Returns:
      Decrypted String
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - If there is an encryption error.

    • encryptBytes

      public byte[] encryptBytes​(String input) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Encrypts a ByteArray with the information received in the Options with a String input.
      Parameters:
      input - String Input
      Returns:
      Encrypted ByteArray
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - If there is an encryption error.

    • setPassword

      public AES setPassword​(String password, String salt)
      Changes the Key based on the Password and Salt. If there is no salt used, the salt will be the same as the password.
      Parameters:
      password - Password
      salt - Salt
      Returns:
      AES Builder

    • setPassword

      public AES setPassword​(String password)
      Changes the Key based on the Password. The required salt will become the entered password.
      Parameters:
      password - Password
      Returns:
      AES Builder

      Returns:
      Private Key

      public AES writeKeyFile​(String fileLocation) throws IOException
      Creates a KeyFile which will store all the encryption information such as Key Length, Private Key, IV Length, Algorithm Type, etc. into one file which can be loaded later to re-generate everything without requiring manual input.
      Parameters:
      fileLocation - String File Location
      Returns:
      AES Builder
      Throws:
      IOException
